mosinstall.name: Events Calendar
mosinstall.author: JEvents Project Group
mosinstall.description: Shows up to 3 different monthly calendar for Events component

param.name: inc_ec_css
param.label: Include Events Cal CSS
param.description: Tells the module if the module Events Calendar CSS should be included or not.This is not recommended - you are better off putting a copy of the CSS in your template_css.css file

param.name: cache
param.label: Enable Cache
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: allcats
param.label: Events from all categories
param.description: Shows events only from the selected category

param.name: catid0
param.label: Specified category
param.description: Shows events only from the selected category

param.name: catid1
param.label: Additional category
param.description: Also include events from this additional category

param.name: catid2
param.label: Additional category
param.description: Also include events from this additional category

param.name: catid3
param.label: Additional category
param.description: Also include events from this additional category

param.name: catid4
param.label: Additional category
param.description: Also include events from this additional category

param.name: @spacer
param.label: Header Links
param.description: Below are the settings for the module header links

param.name: minical_showlink
param.label: Title
param.description: Show title as link (settings below link opens the calendar component). Following parameters are as the will appear later

param.name: minical_prevyear
param.label: Prev. Year
param.description: Show link for previous year (left to the title - link opens calender in year view)

param.name: minical_prevmonth
param.label: Prev. Month
param.description: Show link for previous monht (left to the title - link opens calender in month view)

param.name: minical_actmonth
param.label: Curr. Month
param.description: Show link for current month (middle of title - link opens calender in month view)

param.name: minical_actyear
param.label: Curr. Year
param.description: Show link for current year (middle of title - link opens calender in year view)

param.name: minical_nextmonth
param.label: Next Month
param.description: Show link for next month (right to the title - link opens calender in year month)

param.name: minical_nextyear
param.label: Next Year
param.description: Show link for next year (right to the title - link opens calender in year view)
